mdRecord.dcterms:title: Child Guidance Clinic
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Thompson, Ralph R.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: From clipping: The clinic celebrates first anniversary of its opening. Inspecting the doll house is, left to right: Linda Carter, chief clinical psychologist; Dr. Frank J. Curran, clinic director and associate professor of neurology and psychiatry in the University's medical school; Dr. George S. Stevenson of NY, medical director of the National Committee for Mental Hygiene and president-elect of the American Psychiatric Association; Isabelle A. Nunnelley, member of the executive committee; Dr. David C. Wilson, chairman of the executive committee and professor of neurology and psychiatry; and Jane Hashagan, chief psyciatric social worker.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: University of Virginia Visual History Collection
